query:
SELECT 
  id,
  nome,
  email,
  dum,
  dataUltrassom,
  igUltrassomSemanas,
  igUltrassomDias,
  FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), dum) / 7) as ig_atual_semanas,
  MOD(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), dum), 7) as ig_atual_dias
FROM gestantes 
WHERE email = 'teste@gestantesapp.com'
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 1;
